item.title: The Rise Of Social-Emotional Learning In Higher Education
item.description: Higher education appears to be following the lead of elementary and secondary educators in prioritizing social-emotional learning on campuses.

item.title: NASA-Funded Greenland Survey Reveals ‘Crazy’ Amounts Of Ocean Warming
item.description: NASA-funded undersea robotic vehicle is giving both astrobiologists and climate scientists a window onto Greenland’s previously hidden subsurface.
